Title: [GPS Manager][Map Interaction]Verify that User can hover on vehicle path successfully
Description: Hover over vehicle path to display tooltip with time and registration information
Steps: 1. Locate GPS-tracked vehicle path on map; 2. Position mouse cursor over path line; 3. Hover cursor without clicking; 4. Observe tooltip appearance timing; 5. Verify tooltip content accuracy; 6. Move mouse away from path; 7. Confirm tooltip disappears properly
Expected Result: 1. GPS-tracked vehicle path is visible and identifiable on map; 2. Mouse cursor is positioned correctly over path line; 3. Hover action triggers tooltip display mechanism; 4. Tooltip appears within appropriate timing; 5. Tooltip shows accurate timestamp and vehicle registration VEH-3500; 6. Mouse movement away from path triggers tooltip hiding; 7. Tooltip disappears completely and cleanly
Test Data: Expected tooltip: Time: 1/2/2025 7:03:18 AM; Vehicle Reg Number: VEH-3500

Title: [GPS Manager][Route Points]Verify that User can hover on start/end points successfully
Description: Hover over route start or end icons to display timestamp information
Precondition: Route loaded with start/end points visible
Steps: 1. Locate start or end point icon on route; 2. Position mouse cursor over icon; 3. Hover cursor over icon without clicking; 4. Observe tooltip appearance; 5. Verify timestamp and label accuracy; 6. Check tooltip positioning; 7. Move mouse away and confirm tooltip disappears
Expected Result: 1. Start or end point icon is visible and accessible on route; 2. Mouse cursor is positioned accurately over icon; 3. Hover action activates tooltip display; 4. Tooltip appears showing route point information; 5. Timestamp and Path End Point label are accurate; 6. Tooltip is positioned appropriately near icon; 7. Tooltip disappears when mouse moves away from icon
Test Data: Expected tooltip: Path End Point; Date & Time: Jan 1 2025 03:43:29 PM

Title: [GPS Manager][Unplanned Stops]Verify that User can hover on unplanned stop icon successfully
Description: Hover over parking/unplanned stop icon to display duration and timestamp details
Precondition: Unplanned stop data available and icon visible on map
Steps: 1. Locate unplanned stop icon on map; 2. Position mouse cursor over parking icon; 3. Hover cursor over icon without clicking; 4. Observe tooltip appearance and timing; 5. Verify parking duration information; 6. Check start and end timestamp accuracy; 7. Move mouse away and confirm tooltip disappears
Expected Result: 1. Unplanned stop icon is visible and identifiable on map; 2. Mouse cursor is positioned correctly over parking icon; 3. Hover action triggers unplanned stop tooltip; 4. Tooltip appears with appropriate timing; 5. Parking duration shows 88 minutes correctly; 6. Start and end timestamps are accurate and properly formatted; 7. Tooltip disappears cleanly when mouse moves away
Test Data: Expected tooltip: Parking Duration: 88 minutes; Start: Jan 1 2025 07:15:53 PM; End: Jan 1 2025 08:44:22 PM
